item.title: (Ref) Tools to Design or Visualize Architecture of Neural Network
item.description: 소개 항상 좋은 글을 올려주시는 존경하는 Pega님의 소개로 올려드립니다. Pega님 블로그: https://jehyunlee.github.io/ Tools to Design or Visualize Architecture of Neural Network draw_convnet : Python script for illustrating Convolutional Neural Network (ConvNet) NNSVG PlotNeuralNet : Latex code for drawing neural networks for reports and presentation. Have a look into examples to see how they are made. Additionally, lets consolidate any improvements that you make and fix any bugs to help more people with this code.
